answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes and I just have check my blood sugar every 2 hours and eat six small meals a day .

I have to check my blood sugar 4x a day.  Once when I wake up in the morning then 2 hours after every meal. I also have to take insulin shots twice a day. The only time my sugar has ever been high is the fasting one first thing in the morning. After meals,  it's fine.

question: Hi, did anyone develop gestational diabetes and if so, how are you being treated for it?
title: gestational diabetes
